PERSONA:
elizabeth is a 55-year-old woman living in a metropolitan area in the new england region of the northeast united states. she was born and raised in the u.s. and is a white non-hispanic citizen. elizabeth holds a postgraduate degree and is considered part of the upper-income bracket, earning over $100,000 annually.

despite her financial success, elizabeth maintains liberal ideological views and leans towards the democratic party, though she identifies as an independent voter. she is not particularly religious, considering herself agnostic, and never attends religious services. 

elizabeth is a frequent internet user, going online several times a day. she is also an active member of her community, participating in volunteer work. in her personal life, she is married but has chosen not to have children.

with her metropolitan lifestyle, advanced education, and liberal-leaning political views, elizabeth likely has a diverse social circle and is engaged in various cultural and intellectual pursuits. she values independence, critical thinking, and civic engagement while maintaining a comfortable standard of living.
